description: Noun phrase tagging task that convert the noun phrase to POS tag.:param task: The name of task.:type task: string:param model: The model name in the task.:type model: string:param batch_size: Numbers of examples a batch.:type batch_size: int:param linking: Returns the categories. If linking is True, the fine-grained label (label) will link with the coarse-grained label (category).:type linking: bool
